Comment: I'm so depressed after reading this.  Let's remember this man's name: **Jerce Barrios.** Remember, he's the soccer player who had soccer and crown tattoos. He was falsely accused of gang membership. His story deserves to get out there. There's been some news coverage of him already although not a whole lot. Sadly, there are even more people who haven't gotten any attention at all. r/TheDisappeared
